arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ وَٱلصَّـٰبِـُٔونَ وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	call	themselves	Muslims	- and	similarly	among	the	Jews,	and	the	Sabeans,	and	
the	Christians	*	- whoever	sincerely	accepts	faith	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day,	and	does	good	deeds	
- so	 there	shall	be	no	 fear	upon	 them	nor	shall	 they	grieve.	(Whoever	among	 them	converts	 to	
Islam)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jo	apne	āap	ko	Musalmān	kahte	haiñ	aur	isi	 tarah	Yahūdi	aur	sitārah	parast	aur	
Nasrāni	un	meiñ	jo	koi	sachche	dil	se	Allah	aur	Qayāmat	ke	din	par	imān	lāye	aur	achcha	kām	
kare	to	unpar	na	kuch	andesha	hai	na	kuch	gham

arabicText: لَقَدْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَـٰقَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ رُسُلًۭا ۖ كُلَّمَا جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌۢ بِمَا لَا تَهْوَىٰٓ أَنفُسُهُمْ فَرِيقًۭا كَذَّبُوا۟ وَفَرِيقًۭا يَقْتُلُونَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	ham	ne	Bani-Isrāil se	áhad		liya	aur	unki	taraf	Rasool bheje	jab	kabhi	unke	pās	koi	Rasool
woh	bāt	lekar	āya	jo	unke	nafs	ki	khwāhish	ke	mutābiq	na	thi	ek	giroh	ko	jhutlāya aur	ek	giroh	
ko	shahid	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَحَسِبُوٓا۟ أَلَّا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌۭ فَعَمُوا۟ وَصَمُّوا۟ ثُمَّ تَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ عَمُوا۟ وَصَمُّوا۟ كَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 assumed	 that	 there	 will	 be	 no	
punishment,	so	they	turned	blind	and	deaf	
- then	Allah accepted	 their	 penance,	 then	
again	many	of	them	turned	blind	and	deaf;	
and	Allah is	seeing	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 is	 gumān	 meiñ	 rahe	 ke	 koi	 sazā	 	 na	
hogi	to	andhe	aur	bahre	ho	gaye	phir	Allah	
ne	 unki	 touba	 qabool	 ki	 phir	 un	 meiñ	
bahutere	 (bahut	 se)	 andhe	 aur	 bahre	 ho	
gaye	aur	Allah	unke	kām	dekh	raha	hai

arabicText: لَقَدْ كَفَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْمَسِيحُ يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبَّكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ مَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَمَأْوَىٰهُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنْ أَنصَارٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
They	 are	 certainly	 disbelievers	 who	 say,	
“Allah is	 actually	 the	 Messiah,	 the	 son	 of	
Maryam”;	 whereas	 the	 Messiah	 had	 said,	
“O	 Descendants	 of	 Israel,	 worship	 Allah
Who	 is	 my	 Lord	 and	 (also)	 your	 Lord”;	
undoubtedly	 whoever	 ascribes	 partners	
with	 Allah,	 then	 Allah has	 forbidden	
Paradise	 for	 him;	 his	 destination	 is	 hell;	
and	the	unjust	do	not	have	any	supporters
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	kāfir	hain	woh	jo	kahte	haiñ	Allah	
wohi	 Maseeh Maryam ka	 beta	 hai	 aur	
maseeh	ne	 to	 ye	 kahā	 tha	aey	 bani-Isrā’il	
Allah	ki	bandagi	karo	jo	mera	Rab	hai	aur	
tumhāra	 Rab	 be-shak	 jo	 Allah	 ka	 sharik	
thahrāye	 to	 Allah	 ne	 uspar	Jannat	 harām	
kar	 di	 aur	 uska	 thikāna	 dozakh	 hai	 aur	
zālimoñ	ka	koi	madadgār	nahiñ

arabicText: لَّقَدْ كَفَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ثَالِثُ ثَلَـٰثَةٍۢ ۘ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّآ إِلَـٰهٌۭ وَٰحِدٌۭ ۚ وَإِن لَّمْ يَنتَهُوا۟ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ لَيَمَسَّنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
They	 are	 certainly	 disbelievers	 who	 say,	
“Indeed	 Allah is	 the	 third	 of	 the	 three	
Gods”;	whereas	there	is	no	God	except	the	
One	 God;	 and	 if	 they	 do	 not	 desist	 from	
their	 speech,	 undoubtedly	 a	 painful	
punishment	will	reach	those	among	them	
who	die	as	disbelievers
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	kāfir	haiñ	woh	jo	kahte	haiñ	Allah	
teen	khudāon	meiñ	ka	tisra	hai	aur	Khuda	
to	nahiñ	magar	ek	Khuda	aur	agar	apni	bāt	
se	b’az	na	āaye	to	jo	un	meiñ	kāfir	mareñge	
unko	zaroor	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		pahuñche	ga

arabicText: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
So	why	do	 they	not	incline	 towards	Allah
and	seek	His	forgiveness?	And	Allah is	Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kyuñ	nahiñ	ruju’	karte	Allah	ki	taraf	aur	us	se	bakhshish	māñgte	aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	
maherbān

arabicText: مَّا ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ إِلَّا رَسُولٌۭ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَأُمُّهُۥ صِدِّيقَةٌۭ ۖ كَانَا يَأْكُلَانِ ٱلطَّعَامَ ۗ ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ نُبَيِّنُ لَهُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرْ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	Messiah,	the	son	of	Maryam,	is	purely	
a	Noble	Messenger;	many	Noble	Messengers	have	passed	before	him;	and	his	mother	is	a	truthful	
woman;	they	both	used	to	eat	food;	see	how	We	make	the	signs	clear	for	them,	and	see	how	they	
turn	away!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maseeh	 ibne	 Maryam nahiñ	 magar	 ek	Rasool is	 se	 pahle	 bahut	Rasool ho	 guzre	 aur	 iski	 māñ	
Siddiqah	hai	donoñ	khāna	khāte	the	dekho	to	ham	kaisi	sāf	nishāniyañ	unke	liye	bayān	karte	haiñ	
phir	dekho	woh	kaise	auñdhe	jāte	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا نَفْعًۭا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“What!	You	worship,	other	
than	Allah,	that	which	is	neither	the	controller	of	your	losses	nor	of	your	benefits?	And	Allah only	
is the	All	Hearing,	the	All	Knowing.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kya	Allah	ke	siwa	aise	ko	poojte	ho	jo	tumhāre	nuqsān	ka	mālik	na	nafa	ka	aur Allah	
hi	sunta	jānta	hai

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا تَغْلُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ غَيْرَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَ قَوْمٍۢ قَدْ ضَلُّوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ وَأَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا وَضَلُّوا۟ عَن سَوَآءِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	 Do	 not	
wrongfully	 commit	 injustice	 in	 your	
religion,	and	do	not	follow	the	people	who	
earlier	 went	 astray,	 and	led	many	 others	
astray,	 and	 wandered	 away	 from	 the	
Straight	Path.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 aey	 kitāb	 wāloñ	 apne	 deen	
meiñ	nā	haq	ziyādati	na	karo	aur	aise	logoñ	
ki	khwāhish	par	na	chalo	jo	pahle	gumrāh	
ho	chuke	aur	bahutoñ	ko	gumrāh	kiya	aur	
sidhi	rāh	se	bahak	gaye

arabicText: لُعِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ لِسَانِ دَاوُۥدَ وَعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا۟ وَّكَانُوا۟ يَعْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 among	 the	 Descendants	 of	 Israel	
who	 turned	 disbelievers	 were	 cursed	 by	
the	tongue	of	Dawud,	and	of	Eisa	the	son	of	
Maryam;	 it	 was	 because	 of	 their	
disobedience	and	their	rebellion
romanUrduTranslationText:
La’ānat	 	 kiye	 gaye	 woh	 jinhone	 kufr	 kiya	
Bani-Isrāil meiñ	 Dāwood aur	 Ísa	 Bin	
Maryam ki	 zabān	 par	 ye	 badla	 uski	
nāfarmāni	aur	sarkashi	ka

arabicText: كَانُوا۟ لَا يَتَنَاهَوْنَ عَن مُّنكَرٍۢ فَعَلُوهُ ۚ لَبِئْسَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	did	not	restrain	one	another	from	the	
evil	 they	 used	 to	 do;	 undoubtedly	 they	
used	to	commit	extremely	evil	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	buri	bāt	karte	āpas	meiñ	ek	dūsre	ko	na	
rokte	zaroor bahut	hi	bure	kām	karte	the

arabicText: تَرَىٰ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ يَتَوَلَّوْنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ لَبِئْسَ مَا قَدَّمَتْ لَهُمْ أَنفُسُهُمْ أَن سَخِطَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَفِى ٱلْعَذَابِ هُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
You	 will	 see	 that	 many	 of	 them	 make	
friends	with	the	disbelievers;	what	an	evil	
thing	they	had	sent	ahead	for	themselves,	
for	Allah’s	wrath	came	upon	them	and	they	
will	remain	in	the	punishment,	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	meiñ	tum	bahut	ko	dekhoge	ke	kāfiroñ	
se	dosti	karte	haiñ	kya	hi	buri	cheez	khud	
apne	liye	āage	bheji	ye	ke	Allah	ka	unpar	
ghazab	hua	aur	woh	‘aƶāb		meiñ	hamesha	
raheñge

arabicText: وَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلنَّبِىِّ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَا ٱتَّخَذُوهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Had	 they	 believed	 in	 Allah and	 this	
Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him)	and	what	is	sent	down	upon	
him,	 they	 would	 not	 befriend	 the	
disbelievers,	 but	 most	 of	 them	 are	
disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	woh	Imān	late	Allah	par	aur	in	Nabi par	aur	uspar	jo	unki	taraf	utra	to	kāfiroñ	se	dosti	
na	karte	magar	un	meiñ	to	bahutere	(aksar)	fāsiq	haiñ

arabicText: ۞ لَتَجِدَنَّ أَشَدَّ ٱلنَّاسِ عَدَٰوَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱلْيَهُودَ وَٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا۟ ۖ وَلَتَجِدَنَّ أَقْرَبَهُم مَّوَدَّةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا نَصَـٰرَىٰ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ مِنْهُمْ قِسِّيسِينَ وَرُهْبَانًۭا وَأَنَّهُمْ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
You	will	certainly	find	the	Jews	and	the	polytheists	as	the	greatest	enemies	of	the	Muslims;	and	
you	will	find	the	closest	in	friendship	to	the	Muslims	those	who	said,	“We	are	Christians”;	that	is	
because	scholars	and	monks	are	among	them,	and	they	are	not	proud.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Zaroor	 tum	Musalmānoñ	 ka	 sabse	 bah	 kar	 dushman	Yahūdiyoñ	 aur	mushrikoñ	 ko	 pāoge	 aur	
zaroor	tum	Musalmānoñ	ki	Dosti	meiñ	sabse	ziyādah	qareeb	unko	pāoge	jo	kahte the	ham	Nasāra	
haiñ	ye	isliye	ke	un	meiñ	Ālim aur	Darwesh haiñ	aur	ye	ghuroor	nahiñ	karte
